duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality customer service and represent the company in a positive and professional manner.
Conduct calls with clients, ensuring effective verbal and written communication.
Navigate computer systems efficiently while engaging in phone conversations with clients.
Maintain a quiet and distraction-free work environment.
Handle customer inquiries and issues in a timely and effective manner.
Adhere to company policies and procedures for customer interactions.
Meet performance-based targets and bonus opportunities.
